hero_description: Track all your credit cards in one place. Never miss a payment deadline, monitor your credit lines, and stay on top of important dates effortlessly.
card_management_description: Add, edit, and organize all your credit cards with important details like credit line and cut-off dates.
smart_calendar_description: View all payment deadlines, cut-off dates, and annual fees in one organized calendar.
analytics_description: Track total credit lines, number of cards, and get insights into your credit portfolio.
secure_private_description: Only store non-sensitive information. Your data is encrypted and protected.
how_it_works_subheading: Get started in three simple steps
step1_description: Enter basic information like last 4 digits, bank name, credit line, and important dates.
step2_description: Our smart calendar automatically tracks cut-off dates, payment deadlines, and annual fees.
step3_description: View dashboards with your total credit available, number of cards, and upcoming payments.
cta_ready_description: Join thousands of users who are managing their credit cards smarter. Start free today, no credit card required.
